summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel all unpaid assessment against the eat thirty (30) feet of tract twenty (20) S. B. Yesler Tracts, and the west thirty (30) feet of Tract nine (9), Twenty-one (21), and Twenty-five (25), of said S. B. Yesler Tracts, levied for the improvement of Main Street et al, by constructing sewer therein as provided by Ordinance No. 5868, creating Local Improvement District No. 255, and the improvement of Yesler Way by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, as provided by Ordinance No. 7267, creating Local Improvement District No. 501, and appropriating money therefor.
